hiveArticle.title: Favicon and Power Up Logo Not Changed
hiveArticle.body:
Edit: It looks like the favicon is fixed, but the Power Up Logo still unchanged ![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaXbb6FLurVHJoDpV5z5jvxSWDwi7z3jbCzMx4JG31ztL/image.png)
Just a little while back Steemit has changed its logo from Blue to Green. But the Favicon as well as the Power Up, button Logo has not been changed on the trending or hot page and even from the Blog section. ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1509502584/pxj1alq5f4dfyyp8xejr.png) ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1509502479/yraluyreruxdcnemn7uv.png) When you open the Post you can see the change on the Power up logo. ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1509502673/ybqrgki716iztpe8l2ni.png)
Open Source Contribution posted via Utopian.io
